response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit and enhance your operations. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I am confident it will be a game-changer for you. Considering its worth to you, I propose a price of $11,500 for this product. This offer allows us to mutually benefit while ensuring you receive the best possible solution for your needs. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss further details.", "product_price": 11500}
